subject: Expensive customs
description_text:
Hello,

My order seems to arrive tomorrow via UPS.
The additions cost i almost 50% of the valde or goods 932SEK. Is everyrhing correct on the documentations or have you set A to high value on the package or something?



Best Regards// Mikael Palmqvist

Skickat från Outlook för iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Mikael Palmqvist,    Please send us the UPS invoice so we can confirm it for you.

I received the following response from them:

UPS Tracking Number: 1Z144AW70425518813

The charges for your shipment are as follows:
Chemical Tax: 548 SEK
VAT: Calculated based on 787.82 SEK (value of goods, customs, shipping, and import within the EU) at 25%, which is 196 SEK.
UPS Handling Fee: 150 SEK + 25% VAT

Total: 932 SEK

Skickat från Outlook för iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Från: service@simsonn.com

Hi Mikael Palmqvist,    Thank you for your information. The chemical tax is likely due to the hydraulic rod included in the product, which is a special tax in Sweden. This is the first time we have encountered this issue, and we will optimize our shipping plan. We apologize for the inconvenience and will compensate you with $50.

Thank you so much and i also think its a quite unreasonable amount to charge by our state and customs :(, your support is Quick and appreciated!

Best regards Mikael

Skickat från Outlook för iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Från: service@simsonn.com

Will it go through PayPal?

Skickat från Outlook för iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Från: Mikael Palmqvist <micke_palmqvist@hotmail.com>
Skickat: Thursday, August 7, 2025 1:17:49 PM
Till: service@simsonn.com
Hi Mikael Palmqvist,    We have refunded your money. Please check your account.

Hello,

The transaction is visual in PayPal.
Thank you so much!
The UPS seems to deliver already today so im exited to unbox ✅

Best Regards // Mikael & Alwin

Skickat från Outlook för iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Från: service@simsonn.com

Hello!

The package came friday, fast and perfekt ! There is also money back received through PayPal ✅

I hope that theese small miss alignment and damage to the throttle cable wont cause any issues once i start assembling and test them soon.

Otherwise i might need a sparepart?

Best Regards // Mikael

Skickat från Outlook för iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Från: Mikael Palmqvist <micke_palmqvist@hotmail.com>
Skickat: Friday, August 8, 2025 8:57:43 AM
Till: service@simsonn.com
Hi Mikael Palmqvist,    This may have been damaged by the footrest during transport, but it appears to be in good condition. If you encounter any issues, please contact us at any time.
